# FHL Creative

> Phil is a digital product builder based in Athens, GA. He is a follower of Christ, husband, and father of 3. He builds digital products that he actually wants to use.

## About

FHL stands for Faith, Hope & Love Creative. This is Phil's personal portfolio and landing page showcasing his recent projects and creative work across multiple platforms.

## Recent Projects

- [Townsite](https://townsite.co/): A web platform built by Phil
- [Headshot Studio](https://headshotstudio.me/): A headshot photography tool
- [ImgScraper](https://imgscraper.com/): An image scraping tool

## Creative Work

- [Work on Dribbble](https://dribbble.com/fhlcreative): Design portfolio
- [Freebies on Gumroad](https://gumroad.com/fhl): Free digital products
- [Photos on Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/@fhlcreative): Photography
- [Store on Creative Market](https://creativemarket.com/fhlcreative): Design assets for sale
- [Icons on Noun Project](https://thenounproject.com/creator/Fhlcreative/): Icon designs

## Social

- [Medium](https://medium.com/@fhlcreative): Blog and articles
- [X / Twitter](https://x.com/fhlcreative): Social media

## Contact

Book a call with Phil: https://calendly.com/fhlcreative/30min
